mapper.insert: insert into baggage_request_tb (amount, br_id, member_id) values(#{amount}, #{brId}, #{memberId})
mapper.select: select cb.section, cb.grade_id, bre.amount, r.departure, r.destination, sg.name as seat_grade_name from baggage_request_tb as bre join baggage_route_tb as bro on bre.br_id = bro.id join route_tb as r on r.id = bro.route_id join checked_baggage_tb as cb on cb.id = bro.baggage_id join seat_grade_tb as sg on sg.name = cb.grade_id join member_tb as m on bre.member_id = m.id where bre.member_id=#{memberId}

select cb.section from baggage_request_tb as bre join baggage_route_tb as bro on bre.br_id = bro.id join route_tb as r on r.id = bro.route_id join checked_baggage_tb as cb on cb.id = bro.baggage_id join seat_grade_tb as sg on sg.name = cb.grade_id join member_tb as m on bre.member_id = m.id group by cb.section
